Reviews.Title: Excellent product and service!
Reviews.Author: YH "Little Mang"
Reviews.Content: It was so convenient to order this filter from Amazon:  Samsung sent it with in 3-4 days: it was a great experince!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Millard T
Reviews.Content: Bags arrived quickly and order was accurate. The bags are original equipment so fit was not an issue. Love them!

Reviews.Title: what a vacuum cleaner bag should do
Reviews.Author: ATS
Reviews.Content: Once I received the bags (they were held up at the P.O.???), I put one in my vacuum cleaner for immediate satisfaction.  I was not disappointed!  For some reason, these bags are hard to find and ordering them on line was time efficient and easy.
